With a diverse array of fashion, beauty, and lifestyle products, it has become a go-to place for shoppers seeking quality and style.?                  Experience:    ?     Fresher and  ?     Experienced candidates are both welcome.        NOTE:      ?     This is a temporary role with a  ?     1. Weekend full time (Fri, Sat, Sun) & 2. Daily Part-time (4-5 Hours) requirement. Any Student, Fresher, Not Working Candidate can who can manage the timings.       Job Summary : As a Temporary Store Representative, you will play a vital role in ensuring our store runs smoothly and provides excellent customer service to our valued customers. Your primary responsibilities will include assisting customers, restocking shelves, maintaining store cleanliness, and providing support to the store team.     Key Responsibilities:     Greet and assist customers in a friendly and helpful manner.   Answer customer inquiries and provide information about products and promotions.   Assist with restocking shelves and ensuring products are neatly organized.   Maintain the cleanliness and organization of the store.   Operate cash registers and process customer transactions accurately.   Collaborate with the store team to ensure efficient store operations.   Adhere to all company policies and procedures.               Requirements                  High school diploma or equivalent           Previous retail or customer service experience is a plus.   Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.         Strong attention to detail and organizational abilities.         Ability to work in a fast-paced environment.         Friendly and approachable demeanour.         Must be reliable and punctual.           Working Hours:     This is a 5-7 days temporary position.   Shift Timing - 11 AM - 8 PM / 10 AM - 7 PM                                       Benefits  Attractive Compensation: "Compensation will be provided on an hourly basis."     Valuable Experience: Gain hands-on experience working with?one of the  ?     India's leading        ?      retail      ?     company. Opportunity to acquire new skills.
